body.name: Stove Cover Gas Stove Top Burner Covers Protectors for Samsung Gas Range Stove Mat Protector Reusable, Oven Liners Mat Gas Range Protectors Covers, Stove Guard Non-Stick Washable
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【Compatibility】The stove top protector fit for sam sung model FX510BGS/XAA NX58F5500SB/AA NX58F5500SS/AA NX58F5500SW/AA NX58H5600SS/AA NX58H5650WS/AA NX58J5600SG/AA NX58J7750SG/AA NX58J7750SS/AA NX58K3310SB/AA NX58K3310SS/AA NX58K3310SW/AA NX58K7850SG/AA NX58K7850SS/AA NX58M5600SB/AA NX58M5600SW/AA NX58R4311SG/AA NX58R4311SS/AA NX58R5601SG/AA NX58R5601SS/AA NX58T5601SB/AA NX58T5601SW/AA NX58T7511SG/AA NX58T7511SS/AA NX583G0VBBB/AA NX583G0VBSR/AA NX583G0VBWW/AA.

【Heat Resistant】Our gas stove guard for gas stoves top covers can withstand high temperatures up to 315°C/600℉ for gas stove and 230°C/446℉ for electric stove, without melting, burning, or deforming. Stove protector liners suitable for gas ranges, they provide excellent protection for your cooktop.

【Keep the Cooktop Clean】Stove range burner cover is made of high-quality, prevents scalding and stains, so that the cooktop is protected from spilled or splashed stains and grease, which effectively protects your cooktop. You can say goodbye to those stains and keep the stove clean.

【Safe To Use】The gas stove protector cover is made of 0.3mm double layer thickness, PTFE coating, and fiberglass, which is BPA/PFOA free, environmentally friendly and hygienic, no odor and no impact on, making it perfect for cooking with sam sung gas stoves.

【Get A Perfect Combination】 1pcs x 5 burner stove top covers, 2pcs x silicone stove counter gap cover, cleaning brush set. The stove top protector liners are completely compatible with gas stoves and the precise perforations are integrated with the stovetop, the stove side gap guards can be trimmed based on the unique fit of your stove and counter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stove top mat .
reviews.reviewText: This was a good design with the pattern I needed but was too small. I suggest measuring the top of your oven . It it had fir I would have kept it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's a perfect 🥰 fit and so happy the way it looks. The clean up tools were a extra bonus. Thank you 😊 💓

reviews.reviewerName: James and Amy ReviewsJames and Amy Reviews
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Should Be Included With EVERY Range!
reviews.reviewText: This should be included with every gas range purchase. It is so easy to clean! We just had a large celebration dinner. My stove cleaned up in about 3 minutes! It was so easy to just remove the grates and take the entire protective mat to the sink. It wiped clean with warm water and dish liquid - NO scrubbing required. What a time saver, and it is protecting the finish on the range.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works for my stove
reviews.reviewText: This product is designed for SAMSUNG stoves, however my stove isn't a Samsung. Despite this, it STILL worked!!! The cut-outs fit my burners perfectly. Based on my one stove experience, it seems that the cover isn't wide enough to reach to both sides if it isn't a Samsung stove. Also, I have no idea what brand my oven is.Overall, as long as your stove has this burner pattern, it probably will fit and I didn't have to do any cutting.
